title: Foundation: IT Fundamentals & Linux
description: Start with a strong grasp of IT fundamentals, regardless of your A/L stream. Mastering the Linux command line is non-negotiable, as most cloud and DevOps tools are Linux-based. Also, learn basic networking concepts.

title: Degree and Cloud Platform Certification
description: A degree in IT or Software Engineering is beneficial. Critically, you must learn a major cloud platform. Start with a foundational certification like AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner or Azure Fundamentals, then move to the Solutions Architect Associate level.

title: Junior DevOps/Cloud Engineer
description: Gain practical experience in an entry-level role. You will be responsible for setting up CI/CD pipelines, automating infrastructure deployment using tools like Terraform, and managing containerized applications with Docker and Kubernetes.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: As a DevOps Engineer, you are responsible for the entire software delivery lifecycle, from code commit to production deployment. You will work on improving automation, system reliability, and performance.
institutes: All major tech companies in Sri Lanka

title: Senior DevOps Engineer / Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)
description: Advance to a senior role where you design and implement scalable, resilient, and secure infrastructure. You may also transition to an SRE role, focusing specifically on system reliability and performance. This involves deep architectural knowledge and strategic planning.
